contents.rollMessage:
Initiative Roll

${#dice1:= ref('dex_current')}$ ${#dice2:= ref('ins_current')}$

DEX = 1d${!dice1}$ = ${D1:=[1d:dice1:]}$

INS = 1d${!dice2}$ = ${D2:=[1d:dice2:]}$

Result: ${!D1}$ + ${!D2}$ + ${total_init}$= ${D1+D2+total_init}$

${! largerEq(D1, 6) and D1 == D2 ? string('

CRITICAL SUCCESS! Gain an Opportunity

'): string('')}$ ${!D1 == D2 and D1 == 1 ? string('

FUMBLE

'): string('')}$

contents.tooltip: Current attribute value after modified by statuses, buffs and debuffs.
Dexterity: measures precision, coordination, finesse, reflexes. Affects DEF.
Insight: observation, understanding, reasoning. Affects MDEF.
Might: strength, fortitude. Affects max HP.
Willpower: determination, charisma, discipline. Affects max MP.
You need to setup the active effects to apply status effects. Please check the wiki for more information.
Temporarily reduces your Dexterity die size by one.
Temporarily reduces your Insight die size by one.
Temporarily reduces your Might die size by one.

contents.cssClass: Temporarily reduces your Willpower die size by one.
contents.tooltip: Temporarily reduces your Willpower die size by one.
Temporarily reduces your Dexterity and Insight die sizes by one.
Temporarily reduces your Might and Willpower die sizes by one.

contents.rollMessage:
Rolling a ${!rolled_atr1}$ + ${!rolled_atr2}$ Check

${#dice1:= equalText(string(rolled_atr1) ,'DEX') == true ? ref('dex_current') : 0}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(rolled_atr1) ,'INS') == true and isZero(dice1) == true ? ref('ins_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(rolled_atr1) ,'MIG') == true and isZero(dice1) == true ? ref('mig_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(rolled_atr1) ,'WLP') == true and isZero(dice1) == true ? ref('wlp_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(rolled_atr2) ,'DEX') == true ? ref('dex_current') : 0}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(rolled_atr2) ,'INS') == true and isZero(dice2) == true ? ref('ins_current') : dice2}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(rolled_atr2) ,'MIG') == true and isZero(dice2) == true ? ref('mig_current') : dice2}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(rolled_atr2) ,'WLP') == true and isZero(dice2) == true ? ref('wlp_current') : dice2}$

Result: ${D1+D2}$ HR: ${max(D1, D2)}$

CRITICAL SUCCESS! Gain an Opportunity

'): string('')}$ ${!D1 == D2 and D1 == 1 ? string('

FUMBLE

'): string('')}$

contents.tooltip: 【WLP + WLP】 Produce a magical effect based on the Arcana you have bound.
【WLP + WLP】 Produce a magical effect based on the Arcana you have bound.
【INS + WLP】 or 【MIG + WLP】 Enhance your senses, see through the eyes of an animal, quell the fury of a monster.
【INS + WLP】 or 【MIG + WLP】 Enhance your senses, see through the eyes of an animal, quell the fury of a monster.
【INS + WLP】 Walk on water, shape rock, snuff out fires, cause a rainstorm or summon powerful cyclones.
【INS + WLP】 Walk on water, shape rock, snuff out fires, cause a rainstorm or summon powerful cyclones.
【INS + WLP】 Cause the decay of physical matter, twist the flow of time, teleport creatures or items.
【INS + WLP】 Cause the decay of physical matter, twist the flow of time, teleport creatures or items.
【INS + WLP】 Extract magic from an object, activate a soul circuit, sense the presence of magic.
【INS + WLP】 Extract magic from an object, activate a soul circuit, sense the presence of magic.
【INS + WLP】 Sense the presence and feelings of creatures, put someone to sleep or embolden their heart.
【INS + WLP】 Sense the presence and feelings of creatures, put someone to sleep or embolden their heart.
